snippet.title: Berserk Mode - Early Access trailer
snippet.description:
Sometimes to beat the monsters, you have to be a monster. 

Berserk Mode is a visceral first person roguelite, launching into Early Access January 10, 2022. 

Wishlist Berserk Mode on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1649630/Berserk_Mode/

A Game by Adam Travers:
https://twitter.com/TraversAdam

Music by Cletus Lupus:
https://twitter.com/CletusLupus
